scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p name -n SERVER,API -c blue,cyan "yarn dev-server" "yarn dev-api-server"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -p name -n SERVER,API -c blue,cyan "yarn start-server" "yarn start-api-server"
scripts.build-images: svgo -f images/raw -o images --config=.svgo && svgo -f images/raw-static -o static --config=.svgo
